alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Galveston Island; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 7:13AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Galveston, western Chambers and southeastern Harris Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 712 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pasadena to near Dickinson to Galveston Pleasure Pier. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, League City, Baytown, Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Texas City, northeastern Friendswood, La Porte, Deer Park, Dickinson, South Houston, La Marque, Santa Fe, Seabrook, Webster, Hitchcock, Beach City, Kemah, South Belt / Ellington and Galveston Pier 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Galveston Island; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris
